mapper.select:
SELECT '상품상세 참조' AS NO_REFUND_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS RETURN_COST_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS QUALITY_ASSURANCE_STANDARD , '상품상세 참조' AS COMPENSATION_PROCEDURE , '상품상세 참조' AS TROUBLE_SHOOTING_CONTENTS , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040106') AS MATERIAL , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040107') AS COLOR , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040108') AS "SIZE" , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040109') AS MANUFACTURER , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040110') AS CAUTION
, FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040112') AS PACK_DATE_TEXT , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040113') AS WARRANTY_POLICY , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'040114') AS AFTER_SERVICE_DIRECTOR FROM DUAL

, FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'042613') AS PUBLISH_DATE_TEXT , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'042614') AS DESCRIPTION FROM DUAL

SELECT '상품상세 참조' AS NO_REFUND_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS RETURN_COST_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS QUALITY_ASSURANCE_STANDARD , '상품상세 참조' AS COMPENSATION_PROCEDURE , '상품상세 참조' AS TROUBLE_SHOOTING_CONTENTS , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043106') AS ITEM_NAME , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043107') AS MODEL_NAME , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043108') AS OWNERSHIP_TRANSFER_CONDITION , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043109') AS PAYING_FOR_LOSS_OR_DAMAGE , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043110') AS REFUND_POLICY_FOR_CANCEL , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043111') AS CUSTOMER_SERVICE_PHONE_NUMBER FROM DUAL

SELECT '상품상세 참조' AS NO_REFUND_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS RETURN_COST_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS QUALITY_ASSURANCE_STANDARD , '상품상세 참조' AS COMPENSATION_PROCEDURE , '상품상세 참조' AS TROUBLE_SHOOTING_CONTENTS , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043306') AS PRODUCER , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043307') AS TERMS_OF_USE , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043308') AS USE_PERIOD , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043309') AS MEDIUM , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043310') AS REQUIREMENT , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043311') AS CANCELATION_POLICY , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043312') AS CUSTOMER_SERVICE_PHONE_NUMBER FROM DUAL

SELECT '상품상세 참조' AS NO_REFUND_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS RETURN_COST_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS QUALITY_ASSURANCE_STANDARD , '상품상세 참조' AS COMPENSATION_PROCEDURE , '상품상세 참조' AS TROUBLE_SHOOTING_CONTENTS , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043706') AS SERVICE_PROVIDER , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043707') AS CERTIFICATE_DETAILS , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043708') AS USABLE_CONDITION , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043709') AS CANCELATION_STANDARD , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043710') AS CANCELATION_POLICY , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043711') AS CUSTOMER_SERVICE_PHONE_NUMBER FROM DUAL

SELECT '상품상세 참조' AS NO_REFUND_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS RETURN_COST_REASON , '상품상세 참조' AS QUALITY_ASSURANCE_STANDARD , '상품상세 참조' AS COMPENSATION_PROCEDURE , '상품상세 참조' AS TROUBLE_SHOOTING_CONTENTS , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043806') AS ITEM_NAME , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043807') AS MODEL_NAME , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043808') AS CERTIFICATE_DETAILS , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043809') AS MANUFACTURER , FUN_GET_PA_NAVER_OFFER_EXT(#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'043810') AS AFTER_SERVICE_DIRECTOR
FROM DUAL

SELECT GI.IMAGE_URL AS IMAGE_URL , GI.IMAGE_G AS IMAGE_P , GI.IMAGE_AG AS IMAGE_AP , GI.IMAGE_BG AS IMAGE_BP , GI.IMAGE_CG AS IMAGE_CP , GI.IMAGE_DG AS IMAGE_DP , PG.LAST_SYNC_DATE FROM TPAGOODSIMAGE PG ,TGOODSIMAGE GI WHERE PG.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PG.PA_GROUP_CODE = #{paGroupCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GI.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE
